description:
Controls: WASD and Space.

Estimated completion time is a minute and a half.

This is my first game and I intend to update it further. All assets were made from scratch and any resemblance to any other game is purely coincidental. I gave myself a strict deadline for this project and this is the final result. Any donations will go directly to further development.

Note: There isn't any sound. My current goal is to add sound, fix bugs, and double the length for a Halloween update.

Thank you for playing my game.
